name: Simple Video Management System
author: NAMS, Inc

sections.description:
Simple Video Management System lets you manage the videos you show on your site from most popular servers (YouTube, Amazon S3, Vimeo) and MP4, OGG, MOV formats through one player.

Features:
* Play vidoes on your site hosted on YouTube, Amazon S3, Vimeo
* Play video files in MP4, OGG, and MOV formats hosted on your site
* Know exactly which pages your videos are available on
* Add on the Simple Autowebinar System plugin and create evergreen and on demand webinar replay events

Feedback

  • Thank you for using the the Simple Video Management System
  • At NAMS Toolkit we are always open to your suggestions and feedback, it’s how we get better for you.
  • Contact us here on our site:NAMS Toolkit

More

  • Also see our other plugins

Additional Info

Our Philosophy: Tools that Simply Work
sections.faq:
Does the plugin has some custom requirements?
You only need to have PHP 5.6+
